Package com.spring.web.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.controller.MainController
@Controller public class MainController extends Object
this class is used for the user to have access to the basic pages such as index as well as for displaying and delete from parts of the site such as the sidebar
Author:
Stanley Chilton

  • Method Details

    • toIndex

      @GetMapping("/") public String toIndex(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this is used for the default mapping and redirects the user to the index past
      Parameters:
      model - - used to store all the objects needed for the displaying on the index page
      session - - used to store the clients session status
      Returns:
      index - this redirects the user to the index page when the default mapping is input

    • index

      @GetMapping("/index") public String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this is the method that displays the original index page
      Parameters:
      model - - holds the items to display on the index page
      session - - holds the values of the logged in user
      Returns:
      - this will either return the index page and display it, or will redirect to the login page

    • getAllStudents

      @GetMapping("/getAllStudents") @ResponseBody public List<String> getAllStudents(@RequestParam(value="term",required=false,defaultValue="") String term)
      Provide autocomplete with list of content type tags
      Parameters:
      term - - variable that the auto complete function uses to search the DB
      Returns:
      - returns the students that it has found match the term

    • searchForStudents

      @PostMapping("/searchForStudents") public String searchForStudents(@ModelAttribute("forSearchStudents") User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      returns a list of students to the index page for displaying
      Parameters:
      user - - the user that is being searched for only used for the name to get a list of students
      model - - holds the items to display on the index page
      session - - holds the values of the logged in user
      Returns:
      - reutrns the index page with the list of users to display

    • searchForStudentIndexReturn

      @GetMapping("/searchForStudents") public String searchForStudentIndexReturn()
      this method is used to return someone to the login page if they tpye in /searchforstudents if this method doesnt exist then it will display an error to the user
      Returns:
      this method returns the user to index page

    • deleteNote

      @GetMapping("/deleteNote") public String deleteNote(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method is used to delete notifications when the user clicks on them
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the notification to delete from the database
      model - - holds the items to display on the index page
      session - - holds the values of the logged in user
      request - - this param is used to get the previous pages url so it can redirect you back to
      Returns:
      returns the page that needs to redirected too, which in this case is the page that called this variable

    • editStudent

      @GetMapping("/editStudent") public String editStudent(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method is used for a trainer or sales person to edit a student and load the editing student page
      Parameters:
      id - - user id of student to update
      model - - holds the items to display on the index page
      session - - holds the values of the logged in user
      Returns:
      returns the edit student html page

    • handleMissingParams

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.MissingServletRequestParameterException.class) public String handleMissingParams(org.springframework.web.bind.MissingServletRequestParameterException ex)
      this method is used to redirect the user to the index page if they try access a page that requires params without inputting params
      Parameters:
      ex - - this param is the error message that can be logged when the user doesnt type a param
      Returns:
      returns the user back the index page
